src:
Kingsi - konačno! Barns ispravio Belog za pobedu, Bogdan čekao Bojana, pogodio i eksplodirao, pa ostao još da vežba (VIDEO)
Dosta zanimljiv meč u Golden 1 Centru

02 Nov 2019


Porazima i slobodnom padu došao je kraj! Sakramento je povukao ručnu kočnicu i posle pet uzastopnih neuspeha konačno overio premijerni trijumf nove sezone. Možda je sreća malo umešala svoje prste, ali ispravka Harisona Barnsa na promašaj Nemanje Bjelice u poslednjim sekundama bio je znak da je očajnoj seriji rezultata došao kraj. Sakramento – Juta 102:101! Osveta!

Napetost je mogla da se seče nožem u Golden 1 Centru! Kingsi su bili nadomak toga da ponovo ispuste pobedu i samo tri sekunde delile su ih od novog, mračnog scenarija. Kraljevi su na pet minuta pre kraja vodili rezultatom 97:88, ali su igrači Jute povezali seriju 9:0 i ubrzo poveli rezultatom 101:100 posle rutinskog pogotka Donovana Mičela. Na semaforu je ostalo svega 11,2 sekunde do kraja. Po otvaranju napada, Dearon Foks je ušao u prodor ka košu i otvorio dodavanje za usamljenog Bjelicu u ćošku, ali je pokušaj srpskog asa bio nedovoljno dobar. Barns se pojavio gotovo niotkuda, uhvatio skok i loptu vratio tamo gde je Bjelica namenio! Navijači su pali u trans...



Možda i ključni momenat utakmice dogodio se na nešto manje od sedam minuta pre kraja. Nastala je gužva u reketu gostiju, Foks se bacio za loptu i izbio je pravo u ruke Bogdanu Bogdanoviću, koji je bez razmišljanja ispalio hitac i zapalio mrežicu za 91:86, čime je odbio jedan od velikih naleta rivala! Bogdanova šuterska kriza uzela je maha u uvodnih pet utakmica, ali je danas bio daleko sigurniji. Koliko mu je to značilo videlo se posle jedne situacije u kojoj je bio u direktnom sudaru s prezimenjakom Bojanom. Bogdan je lepo nadriblao loptu, šutnuo i pogodio, posle čega je onako sočno opsovao na srpskom, a doživeo je i emotivnu eksploziju u tom momentu. Reakciju pogledajte OVDE. Meč je završio s 14 poena (5/8 iz igre, 3/6 za tri), te dva skoka i jednom asistencijom. I pored dobre role, Bogdanović je posle utakmice ostao u Golden 1 Centru kako bi odradio šuterski trening kako bi spremniji dočekao nastavak sezone. Više pogledajte OVDE.
Foks je bio najefikasniji kod Kingsa s 25 poena, pet skokova i četiri asistencije. Bjelica je odigrao gotovo 26 minuta i skupio 11 poena (4/8 iz igre, 3/6 za tri), uz šest skokova, tri asistencije i jednu ukradenu loptu. Badi Hild je dopisao 18 poena, bez pogotka s distance (0/5). Kod Jute 24 poena ubacio je Mičel, 19 je imao Majk Konli, a Bojan 17 poena. Rudi Gober je ubeležio 15 poena i jedan skok više!




NBA - rezultati

Bruklin – Hjuston 123:116/Prins 27 – Harden 36/
Indijana – Klivlend 102:95/Brogdon 25 – Lav 22/
Orlando – Milvoki 91:123/Furnije 19 – Adetokunbo 29/
Boston – Njujork 104:102/Voker 33 – Moris 29/
Čikago – Detroit 112:106/Levin 26 – Dramond 25/
Dalas – LA Lejkers 110:119 (posle produžetka - 103:103)/Dončić 29 – Džejms 39/
Sakramento – Juta 102:101/Foks 25 – Mičel 24/
Golden Stejt – San Antonio 110:127/Rasel 30 – Mils 31/

text:
Kings - finally! Barnes corrects White for victory, Bogdan waits for Bojan, hits and explodes, and remains to practice (VIDEO)
Quite an interesting match at Golden 1 Center

02 Nov 2019


Defeat and free fall has come to an end! Sacramento pulled the parking brake and, after five consecutive failures, finally certified the premiere triumph of the new season. Luck may have been a bit of a mess, but Harrison Barnes' correction of Nemanja Bjelica's failure in the final seconds was a sign that the desperate series of results was over. Sacramento - Jute 102: 101! Revenge!

Tension could cut with a knife at the Golden 1 Center! The Kings were close to missing out on the win again, with just three seconds separating them from the new, dark scenario. The Kings led 97:88 five minutes before the end, but the Utah players tied the series 9-0 and soon led 101-100 after Donovan Mitchell's routine goal. Only 11.2 seconds left in the traffic light. Upon opening the attack, Dearon Fox made a breakthrough into the basket and opened the pass for a lone White in the corner, but his attempt at a Serbian ace was not good enough. Barnes appeared out of nowhere, grabbed the jump and returned the ball to where White was intended! Fans fell into trans ...



Perhaps the key moment of the match happened just under seven minutes before the end. There was a crowd in the racquet of the guests, Fox threw for the ball and struck straight into the hands of Bogdan Bogdanovic, who thoughtlessly fired a shot and fired the net for 91:86, repulsing one of the big bouts of rivals! Bogdan's shootout crisis took a beating in the opening five games, but he was far safer today. How much that meant to him was evident after one situation in which he was in direct collision with the surname Bojan. Bogdan nicely grabbed the ball, kicked it and hit it, after which he swore juicy in Serbian, and experienced an emotional explosion at that moment. See the reaction HERE. The match ended with 14 points (5/8 from the game, 3/6 for three), two rebounds and one assist. Despite a good roll, Bogdanovic stayed at the Golden 1 Center after the game to do a shooter training to get more ready for the season to go on. See more HERE.
Fox was most effective with the Kings with 25 points, five rebounds and four assists. White played nearly 26 minutes and collected 11 points (4/8 from the game, 3/6 for three), with six rebounds, three assists and one steal. Buddy Hild posted 18 points, no goal from distance (0/5). In Utah, he scored 24 points for Mitchell, 19 for Mike Conley and 17 points for Bojan. Rudi Gober scored 15 points and one jump more!




NBA - Results

Brooklyn - Houston 123: 116 / Prins 27 - Harden 36 /
Indiana - Cleveland 102: 95 / Brogdon 25 - Lion 22 /
Orlando - Milwaukee 91: 123 / Fournier 19 - Adetokunbo 29 /
Boston - New York 104: 102 / Walker 33 - Morris 29 /
Chicago - Detroit 112: 106 / Levin 26 - Drummond 25 /
Dallas - LA Lakers 110: 119 (after extra time - 103: 103) / Doncic 29 - James 39 /
Sacramento - Utah 102: 101 / Fox 25 - Mitchell 24 /
